recommended_degree: Administrasi, Administrasi Bisnis Terapan, Administrasi Bisnis, Administrasi Bisnis Internasional (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
• Data entry and compilation for academic reports 
• Supporting the documentation process for exams and assessments 
• Assisting in organizing materials and logistics for new student onboarding 
• Preparing graduation-related documents and ensuring data accuracy 
• Supporting general day-to-day academic administrative work
